Name: Help Cherry hand out the tonic
Description: Help Cherry hand out the tonic to those in need
QuestDesc: Help Cherry hand out the tonic to those in need

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pre-mixed refreshing tonic. A recipe from the Fisalia family.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come and get yours here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, {PlayerName}, can I interest you in some tonic?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The crisis's over, and we wanted to do our part in helping Cantarella. So here I am in Septimont as the visiting pharmacist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That'll be great! Let's hand these out together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dorian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fisalia's are nothing like the rumors said...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dorian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, that's one bitter tonic!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, you lot go on ahead. I'll pass!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm healthy as a horse!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rolla
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Afraid of a bit of bitter taste, Coach?

Dialogues.Speaker: Gren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nonsense! Since when a Gladiator can't take a little bitterness?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rolla
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, have at it then. You were halfway through the Dark Tide last time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rolla
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. The pharmacist says it's not as bitter as you'd think. Even the Champion had some.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's nothing compared to the alternative.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not bitter? Fine, hit me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pre-mixed refreshing tonic. A recipe from the Fisalia family.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come and get yours here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fisalia's are nothing like the rumors said...

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, that's one bitter tonic!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the last of them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for your help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Isn't life full of surprises? Never thought I'd come to Septimont as a Fisalia pharmacist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't wait to see what happens tomorrow!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the last of them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for your help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, you lot go on ahead. I'll pass!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm healthy as a horse!
